alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Ottawa; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 07 at 2:20PM CST until February 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY NORTHWEST WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 020, AND 034... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Tuesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 008, 020, and 034. * WIND...North-northwest winds sustained between 15 and 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. Additionally, any recently burned brush piles should be checked to ensure piles are completely extinguished.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
